channel.title: OCI on 乱世浮生
channel.description: Recent content in OCI on 乱世浮生

item.title: 使用 Jib 为 Java 应用构建镜像
item.description: Jib是Google Container Tools中的一个工具。 Jib builds optimized Docker and OCI images for your Java applications without a Docker daemon - and without deep mastery of Docker best-practices. It is available as plugins for Maven and Gradle and as a Java library.
